title: Valentine Ring
summaries: The Valentine Ring is an accessory that increases jump height and 50% health regeneration, however it only works if it is thrown at the ground and picked back up or given to another player. It is purchased from the Merchant for 1 each, during the Valentine's Day event.

statistics.Tooltip:
Give it to someone special! /
50% health regeneration
Increases jump height
statistics.Buy: 1
statistics.Sell: 20
